name: Insane Puzzle
description:
This puzzle is insane....it's very simple to figure out, and once you crack the formula you can answer every question right each time. In fact, with the formula the average 5 year old can answer every one of the problems correct.

However, it seems the more you think, the harder it gets.

Enjoy the puzzle, and when you have figured it out, amaze your friends with how you get it right every single time.

If you have any questions, want a hint, or have just given up--just e-mail us support@pattrns.com and we will assist.

If you have any issues with the app e-maill support@pattrns.com for a rapid reply!
